title: NIPGR Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for Project Scientist I Posts
description: The National Institute of Plant Genome Research (NIPGR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Scientist I Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech, Ph.D., can apply for the NIPGR Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selec...
